data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Oberösterreich, Austria.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oberösterreich, Austria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Oberösterreich, Austria a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 106 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Oberösterreich, Austria.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Oberösterreich, Austria to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Oberösterreich, Austria humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, German-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, German-speaking people know you.
Father, remind your church in Oberösterreich that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Oberösterreich, Austria to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Oberösterreich, Austria has a population of 1,400,900.

We estimate Oberösterreich has 7,984 people who might know Jesus, 940,791 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 452,125 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 175 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Oberösterreich, Austria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Oberösterreich
